Subject: Not able to block contents over mail
Description:
I am not being able to block PII data over email neither in application nor in webmail.

Kindly help me in this issue on priority basis because this is hampering my business.
DevOps_Steps_to_Reproduce__c:
1.Set CAP to block PII's over email.
2. Attach a file to the email. (On web and app email both are blocked with the destination outlook.office.com)
What_We_Know__c:
The customer wants to allow pii internally over internal email and block any pii sent externally.
Email attachment is blocked with destination outlook.office.com

- Customer wants to block the Zoho Suite
- I opened a productboard feature request for it
- customer keeps pushing for it to be prioritised
- link to feature request: https://netwrix.productboard.com/insights/notes/view/4364-followed-notes?d=notes%2F47243715
Next_Steps__c: feature request was created, currently following it
Solution_Comment__c: feature request was raised for the Zoho suite to be included as an exit point
